LanguageData.Hediffs_MedicineLv1.label: Ijutsu Lv.1
LanguageData.Hediffs_MedicineLv1.description: Tip 1: The Level 1 and 2 buff of Ijutsu (Medicine/Healing Art) may be activated by simple meals, luxury items, and processed foods.
LanguageData.Hediffs_MedicineLv2.label: Ijutsu Lv.2
LanguageData.Hediffs_MedicineLv2.description: Tip 2: Buffs can be attained for all vanilla skill types (plants, animals, construction, etc).
LanguageData.Hediffs_Medicine.label: Ijutsu
LanguageData.Hediffs_Medicine.description: Thank you for letting me experience all the flavors of the world!\nKnowledge is power, and what better way to learn than to eat, eat, eat! Kanpai!
LanguageData.Hediffs_Medicine.stages.0.label: initial
LanguageData.Hediffs_Medicine.stages.1.label: Lv.3
LanguageData.Hediffs_Medicine.stages.2.label: Lv.4 Max
